title: Japan : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: In general Number of internet users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly constant from 2019 to 2021, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Number of internet users in millions, about 117.9 was reported at Year 2019,  2020, and 2021
The lowest Number of internet users in millions, of value 117.6 was reported at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall Number of internet users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly constant from 2019 to 2021, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
